001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.LetterGrade;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
006
007import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges.LetterGradeRange;
008import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges.LetterGradeRange.InvalidLetterGradeRange;
009import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student.Section.GRADUATE;
010import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE;
011import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
012import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
013import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
014
015public class GradeBookTest {
016
017  @Test
018  public void defaultLetterGradeRanges() {
019    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
020    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges undergrad = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
021    assertDefaultLetterGradeRanges(undergrad);
022
023    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges grad = book.getLetterGradeRanges(GRADUATE);
024    assertDefaultLetterGradeRanges(grad);
025  }
026
027  private void assertDefaultLetterGradeRanges(GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges) {
028    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.A, 94, 100);
029    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.A_MINUS, 90, 93);
030    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.B_PLUS, 87, 89);
031    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.B, 83, 86);
032    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.B_MINUS, 80, 82);
033    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.C_PLUS, 77, 79);
034    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.C, 73, 76);
035    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.C_MINUS, 70, 72);
036    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.D_PLUS, 67, 69);
037    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.D, 63, 66);
038    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.D_MINUS, 60, 62);
039    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.F, 0, 59);
040  }
041
042  private void assertLetterGradeRange(GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges, LetterGrade letterGrade, int minimum, int maximum) {
043    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(letterGrade);
044    assertThat("No range for " + letterGrade, range, not(nullValue()));
045    assertThat("Less than for " + letterGrade, range.maximum(), equalTo(maximum));
046    assertThat(range.minimum(), equalTo(minimum));
047  }
048
049  @Test
050  public void minimumValueGreaterThanMaximumValue() {
051    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
052    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
053    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
054    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, () ->
055      range.setRange(100, 99)
056    );
057  }
058
059  @Test
060  public void minimumValueEqualsMaximumValue() {
061    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
062    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
063    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
064    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, () ->
065      range.setRange(99, 99)
066    );
067  }
068
069  @Test
070  public void defaultLetterGradeRangesAreValid() {
071    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
072    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
073    ranges.validate();
074  }
075
076  @Test
077  public void rangesDoNotStartAtZero() {
078    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
079    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
080    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.F);
081    range.setRange(2, range.maximum());
082    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, ranges::validate);
083  }
084
085  @Test
086  public void rangesDoNotContain100() {
087    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
088    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
089    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
090    range.setRange(range.minimum(), 99);
091    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, ranges::validate);
092  }
093
094  @Test
095  public void rangesAreContiguous() {
096    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
097    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
098    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
099    range.setRange(range.minimum() + 1, range.maximum());
100    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, ranges::validate);
101  }
102
103  @Test
104  public void rangesAreContiguousNotARange() {
105    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
106    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
107    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.C);
108    range.setRange(range.minimum(), range.maximum() - 1);
109    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, ranges::validate);
110  }
111
112  @Test
113  public void scoreIsInRange() {
114    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
115    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
116    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
117    range.setRange(90, 100);
118
119    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(90.0), is(true));
120    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(100.0), is(true));
121    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(95.0), is(true));
122    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(89.5), is(true));
123    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(101.0), is(false));
124    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(89.0), is(false));
125    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(89.4), is(false));
126
127  }
128
129  @Test
130  public void scoresAreCorrectlyMappedToLetterGrades() {
131    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
132    assertThat(book.getLetterGradeForScore(UNDERGRADUATE, 99.0), equalTo(LetterGrade.A));
133    assertThat(book.getLetterGradeForScore(UNDERGRADUATE, 93.0), equalTo(LetterGrade.A_MINUS));
134  }
135
136}
